title: Heat things up with the Dragon icon

replies.body: should be able to buy icons with IP

While that'd be great, that wouldn't fit in with the business strategy of Riot, which is all game-affecting things (Champs, runes, etc.) can be bought with IP, whereas anything that is purely cosmetic (Skins, etc.) will cost you real money.

It's a common, and perfectly reasonable thing to see in Free To Play games.

Anyway, they do release icons for 1 IP every now and again. Maybe there'll be one you like at some point.
Be careful where you sling common sense around here.
Last time I checked you can buy rune pages with ip, I think that it's 6300, I've brought two so far, (now I have 4) which seems to be enough to get by with

there was once a bundle
2 for 6300 ip
OH wow,  how did I not know that. Thanks! Keep up the good work Riot.

Champs can be bought using money too though. Riot is a lot more... "Fluid" about their money making compared to, say, CSGO. There's a delineation between cosmetic and game impacting, but it's greyer than a lot of games.

Not quite Nexxon but at that point there's no delineation at all.

The thing about champions that makes them a dual purchase option is the fact that they all rotate on for free every once in a while, add to that the fact that (in theory) the champs should be mostly balanced, and therefore whether or not you buy a champ or just use the free ones *shouldn't* matter, and purchasing the champ is just a guarantee that it will always be available for selection, making them a gameplay affecting/personal preference thing, hence the dual purchase options
they've sold icons before for 1000+ IP.
When you step on {{champion:17}} Shroom.
{{champion:18}} rocket jumping off a {{champion:17}} shroom
and again you have to spend money on something so small and unnoticeable as this. good job riot
So what are your ideas for generating revenue for a free game? Or would you prefer to buy the game and get free stuff like this?
no, what i'm saying is that you have to spend RP for everything besides champions and runes, and there should be a way to get some of the cosmetics using ip

Given the fact it doesn't affect gameplay this is a good business strategy. Fact is if even cosmetic stuff could be bought through IP there would be nothing to allow riot to actually make money, which given the amount of work goes into the game would suck for the developers/programmers/artists etc...

Plus, you can earn icons every now and again for completing certain tasks.

i know what you mean and i do agree with you. but there should be some selection of skins/ward skins that you should be able to pay with ip, or earn through achievement-like things like the bilge water event that are more than just summoner icons
True

Some of the cosmetics for something other than RP? like victorious skins? Or free skins after a character rework like Karma or Trundle? Or are you talking about event skins like Captain Gangplank or Triumphant Ryze? Or do you just want more completely free promo skins like Riot Girl Tristan/Unchained Alistar/Dreadknight Garen.
yes kind of like them but it would also be great if a select few of skins could be purchased in the store for ip especially
The real final boss of summoners rift doesn't pay he earns it in game, like what a real boss will do.
you have to buy final boss veigar and battle boss blitzcrank

Why not have icons for a certain number of skins? This way people won't feel as ripped off since the icons come as an achievement and bonus.
e.g. people have Arcade skins, why not give an icon for having all or most of the arcade skins?
its 250rp, chocolate is more expensive and it wont last a fraction of the time
{{summoner:30}} PLZ RETURN
LOL I thought that's free icon{{item:3512}}
{{champion:432}} JG OP

Should make a side-quest for {{champion:16}} and {{champion:19}}, if {{champion:19}} kills {{champion:16}} a certain number of times in a row he turn human with a buff or something, but if {{champion:16}} kills him she gets a buff?
